website_summaries.verdict: Vans Old Skool Pro shoes are just like the classic Vans Old Skools but with new upgrades that give modern comfort and lots of arch and heel support. The board feel is also excellent, and these sneakers should serve you well, whether used for skating, fashion, or all-day wear.A good breaking in will also make these Old Skool Vans Pro sneakers more comfortable and form-fitting.
pros: Vans Old Skool Pro shoes are rated as very comfortable by plenty of people
A lot of reviewers are all praises for these low-top sneakers from Vans because of the sneakers’ classic but edgy look
Many users love how casual footwear hugs the foot and give wearers a good fit
Several people have remarked that the Old Skool Pro shoes by Vans were more durable than other Vans Old Skool versions
A significant number of individuals commend the good quality of the Vans lifestyle shoes
The low-top sneakers are worth every penny, according to some appreciative consumers
A handful of customers love how versatile the shoes are because you can use them at the gym, the office, or the home
A few testers reported that Vans Pro Old Skool kicks are good skate shoes because they give excellent board feel and impact support
A small number of persons have commented that Old Skool Vans Pro shoes provide adequate arch and heel support
cons: The low-top sneakers need to be broken in before they would become fully comfortable, according to many Vans Old Skool Pro reviews
A few skaters do not like the addition of canvas material to the shoes’ uppers, because hardflips, varials, and ollies can quickly shred the canvas part

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: I used these for skateboard for a while until I realised that canvas shoes are not really ideal, (I would suggest sude shoes) it created large hole at the canvas side and the bottom side part sanded away from the grip tape of the board in a matter of seconds. Other than that they are cool looking casual walking shoes.. not really durable for skateboarding unless you don't care about wear and tearing them straight way.
customer_reviews.author: Lavaiso

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and are now my favourite work shoes. They are stylish too and have a brand that people recognise, which makes a change for me!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Vans never disappoints
customer_reviews.text: One can not go wrong with a fresh pair of Vans. Comfortable and stylish like every other pair I've owned.
customer_reviews.author: Nnaemeka Nwosu

customer_reviews.title: rubbish
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart after a few months of wearing them.. all ripped at the sides. Vans quality has really nosedived.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great Vans
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these Vans. Wish I had bought 2 pairs at the cheaper price. Will buy again though.
customer_reviews.author: dozy1

customer_reviews.title: Excellence for feet.
customer_reviews.text: They are Vans - Quality, Style, Comfort -, & don't fall apart after 2 weeks of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These are fabulous they fit so well and the colour is great .and the price is excellent .
customer_reviews.author: Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: meh..
customer_reviews.text: they're really nice and sturdy, but not the most comfortable shoes ever :/ i needed some time to break them in and they are still not good for longer walks..
customer_reviews.author: Diana Dukanac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just love them and I will be back to buy more Denmark
customer_reviews.author: victoria stuart henningsen eiming

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, the price, the fit. So comfy! Amazon price is brilliant too, well worth the money/
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Daughter likes them
customer_reviews.text: Not nice material. They are like a woven canvas, but odd
customer_reviews.author: Lady Dee

customer_reviews.title: New favourite shoes
customer_reviews.text: At the price I got these for I can't argue at all they're brilliant and very comfortable, good old Vans
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for work and have probably worn them about 9 times. The material is starting to fray above the left toes. Totally not worth the money!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Davies

customer_reviews.title: My new favourites
customer_reviews.text: These are my new favourite sneakers. Absolutely love the aztec style print. Even more that the print is slightly different on each sneaker. Very comfortable, and was able to wear immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Ironside

customer_reviews.title: Recommended !
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as party shoes and i still have em !! Good !
customer_reviews.author: Skyfar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favourite pair of sneakers. They are lovely, excellent quality, fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my normal VANS size 5 UK, but they are still too big...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased, arrived quickly and haven't taken them off yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lisa S. Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoe laces different lengths;one too short to tie properly. Otherwise as ordered
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Claire Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good fit. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 14 year old son. Good fit. Would definitely recommend. They go with every outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vans Unisex Adults' Authentic Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Features: Sneaker Low cut Canvas Lacing with metal eyelets Flat Laces Vulcanised rubber sole Treaded sole Absorption EVA insole Hard-wearing material Logo patch Manufacturer colour: amber gold/true Outer Shell: Textile Lining: Textile Sole: Plastic
